text:
="preserve">Juan Carlos Guerra Zunzunegui (1 February 1935 – 28 September 2020) was a Spanish politician and lawyer. Guerra Zunzunegui was born in Madrid. He was a member of the People's Party. From 1977 to 1986, he was a member of the Senate. Between 1986 to 2008, he was in the Congress of Deputies.
Guerra Zunzunegui died on 28 September 2020 in Madrid, aged 85.
